tool_description: Extract data from documents and scans
name: Document Parser and Extraction
title: Document Parser and Extraction

api_list.name: Monitor Job
api_list.description:
Check the status of a submitted job via **search/new**
Once **progress** reaches 100, job is completed and results can be exported.

api_list.name: List
api_list.description: Get a list of existing extraction vocabularies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://document-parser-and-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/dictionaries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "document-parser-and-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://document-parser-and-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/dictionaries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "document-parser-and-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: CSV Export
api_list.description: Export results in as a CSV file
